actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to climate manipulation.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Department of the Interior, the Environmental Protection Agency, the Department of Commerce, and the Secretary of Agriculture should design and conduct studies to enable the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to forecast the immediate and long-term effect that climate manipulation may have on agriculture, transportation, communication, and plant and animal communities.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to climate manipulation.
